Package com.example.mini_pekkas.ui.event.user

Class EventViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.mini_pekkas.ui.event.user.EventViewModel
public class EventViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel class for managing event data in the UI. This class holds LiveData for event details and provides methods to update and retrieve them.
